name: asd-nav
description: Navigation component that reads routes from React Router to render a nested html-list of links.
author: Andreas Fridlund <afridlund85@gmail.com>

scripts.integration: npm run build &&  mocha test/integration --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.system: npm run build && mocha test/system --recursive --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.demos: npm run demo && npm run demo-es5 && npm run demo-bs
scripts.demo: browserify examples/vanilla/src/app.jsx -o examples/vanilla/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.demo-es5: browserify examples/es5/src/app.jsx -o examples/es5/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.demo-bs: browserify examples/bootstrap/src/app.jsx -o examples/bootstrap/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.demo-mz: browserify examples/materialize/src/app.jsx -o examples/materialize/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
